user.name: Saad Bin Khalid
user.bio:
I am a flutter developer creating responsive
and visually appealing cross-platform applications.
user.about: I am a flutter developer creating responsive and visually appealing cross-platform applications. My portfolio showcases my ability to develop applications from multiple domains on multiple platforms like android, iOS, web, and desktop. Let's work together to create an online presence that exceeds your expectations.

skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.description: I develop beautiful and responsive frontend UI designs in flutter. I also recreate given designs from websites like Figma, Adobe XD.

skills.title: Backend Integration
skills.description: I integrate backend APIs and databases into the frontend applications. I specialize in using firebase services for backend.

skills.title: AI Technologies
skills.description: I extensively use Artificial Intelligence in my apps, ranging from OpenAI & Gemini APIs to smart recommendation systems.

services.title: Multi-Platform Apps
services.subtitle: I create apps for android, iOS, websites & desktops

services.title: Bugs Fixing
services.subtitle: I fix bugs and unexpected problems in existing applications.

services.title: Reskining
services.subtitle: I can reskin templates with your own logo and themes.

projects.title: E-Service
projects.description: A multi-vendor ecommerce application for trading different business services
projects.explanation: E-Service is a sophisticated multi-vendor e-commerce application designed specifically for trading various business services. It serves as a marketplace where service providers can offer a wide range of services, and customers can easily browse, compare, and purchase the services they need.

projects.title: Dashboards
projects.description: A collection of web UI designs showcasing different types of beautiful user dashboards.

projects.title: Izdiwaj
projects.description: An islamic match making app for finding your soulmates powered by optimized recommendation algorithms with special focus on user privacy.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A simple but beautiful application to keep track of you daily small tasks.

projects.title: Twin Designs
projects.description: An aesthetic modern looking portfolio website for an IT agency

reviews.text: Saad exceeded my expectations by developing a fantastic matchmaking app, Izdiwaj, in Flutter. His expertise, dedication, and timely delivery were exceptional. Communication was seamless, and he addressed all requirements perfectly. Highly recommend Saad for any app development project. A true professional!
